title: 70’s 5/Mad Limestone Stately Townhouse chic Apt  or Lux Showroom Space
posting_body: ['Elegant situation here.', '71st off Mad.', 'Mixed-Use hi-end building Ralph Lauren neighbor.', 'Rare opportunity to lease spectacular Old-World historic unique space in superb location nestled within bustling Upper East Side -just mere steps from the Frick Museum and Central Park.', 'This landmark limestone townhouse c.1890 has been all restored w/ all original detail maintained.', " Well maintained & attended elevator/laundry building-Large 2BR/2BTH w/Vintage Wood Burning fireplace, closest galore, 11' ceilings and charm-filled.", 'Cheerful 1400 SF.', 'Space may be used as an deluxe apartment  or for low-traffic office/ by appointment only business, ie: gallery, art, jewelry, foundation and the like,', 'Broker shows by appointment only typically afternoons.', 'AAA situation requires AAA references and application.', 'Please leave detailed contact info when responding.', ' Photos coming soon !', "Note: Also, 78th and Mad 650 SF 1BR apt with 11' ceilings at $3300 mo"]
